item.title: [B][COLOR aqua]•[/COLOR][COLOR yellow]•[/COLOR][COLOR gold] IPTVCAT USA[/COLOR][COLORred] (R) [/COLOR][COLOR yellow]•[/COLOR][COLOR aqua]•[/COLOR][/B]

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): lastpg=re.findall('data-ci-pagination-page="(\d+)"><i\s*class',page_data)[0] return [(str(pages),) for pages in range(1,int(lastpg)+1)]

regex.name: makelist2
